title: Can you get out?
content:
Try to get out of these rooms :P

[url=http://www.fasco-csc.com/works/bluechamber/index_e.php]Blue Room[/url]
[url=http://web.okaygo.co.uk/apps/letters/flashcom/index.htm]Crimson Room[/url]
[url=http://www.fasco-csc.com/works/viridian/index_e.html]Viridian Room[/url]

I've managed to get out of the Crimson Room, never fully explored the blue one, and stuck in Viridian Room.

I'd like some hints on the last room if you find out :P-------------------------------
If something's HARD to do, then it's NOT worth doing. -Homer J. Simpson

title: Re: Can you get out?
content: viridain room is creepy with sound,under the rug theres a skeleton![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-shikadi.gif[/img] bp ate the dopefish!

title: Re: Can you get out?
content:
check out:
trash can,fridge,under shoes,under shelf,under green "papers",in cabnet,on cabnet[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smoke2.gif[/img] bp ate the dopefish!

title: Re: Can you get out?
content: I have completed that Crimson Room. Couldn't find out from Viridian Room. Haven't even tried the Blue Room. Should try those two rooms when have more spare time. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: buh?
content: I've never understood the appeal in these "games"... why should I want to play this?  O_o

title: Re: buh?
content:
Because you feel sooooooooooo clever when you completed them after two hours of boring gameplay.
Or something like that.-----------------

title: yeah
content: There seems to be a large amount of mysticism surrounding these "room" games... every thread I've read about them has involved some sort of discussion about the character you play as being suicidal / already dead / other morbid stuff.  It's just a game, right?

title: Re: yeah
content: ^ Never heard of any that kind of stuff.. Hmmm, why do they say so?You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: yeah
content:
Yeah, it is funny how adicting these games can be. Maybe people take it as a test of their intelligence.-------------------------------
If something's HARD to do, then it's NOT worth doing. -Homer J. Simpson

title: Re: yeah
content: Can be, but completing them requires more good eye and chance to click from the right place, and not much IQ. I guess. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: yeah
content: I tried the blue room, but got too frustrated to continue after receiving the death letter, and making no progress. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] [img]http://www.geocities.com/miniopolis/soul.txt[/img]
